name: Out of Control (itch) (DupliCAT)
description:
In this game you don't control the Character, but the platforms around it. Make sure to go to the right to reach the green box which is the end.  There are also yellow spinning boxes which are not controllable.

There is also a built in timer if you want to beat the game as fast as possible!

Currently the game is in development.

Control
Rotate the platform you are on with the up and down arrowkeys.
